entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
